alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 4:02AM MST until December 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts up to 2 feet possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains, Grand and Battlement Mesas and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, especially tonight. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
